refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The label of a question or answer identifies the label that is to be used when formatting the question or answer.

refsection.title: Processing expectations
refsection.para: The label element is used as the label for the question or answer. A processing application might, for example, format the label as a heading preceding the question or answer contents, or it might format it as a run-in heading in the first paragraph of the question or answer.
